faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Zenith and how it can transform your productivity

items.question: How does Zenith's AI actually work?
items.answer: Zenith uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze your work patterns, energy levels, and productivity cycles. It learns from your behavior to automatically prioritize tasks, suggest optimal work times, and recommend breaks when you need them most.

items.question: Is my data secure and private?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption, are SOC 2 Type II certified, and GDPR compliant. Your data is never sold to third parties, and you maintain full control over your information with the ability to export or delete it at any time.

items.question: What integrations are available?
items.answer: Zenith integrates with over 100 popular tools including Slack, Gmail, Google Calendar, Notion, Airtable, Zoom, Microsoft Office, Trello, Asana, and many more. We're constantly adding new integrations based on user requests.

items.question: How is Zenith different from other productivity apps?
items.answer: Unlike traditional task managers, Zenith focuses on work-life balance with AI-powered wellness tracking, energy-based scheduling, and burnout prevention. It's not just about getting more doneâ€”it's about sustainable productivity that enhances your overall quality of life.

items.question: How quickly will I see results?
items.answer: Most users report noticeable improvements within the first week, with significant productivity gains and stress reduction within 30 days. The AI becomes more accurate as it learns your patterns, so results continue to improve over time.

items.question: Can my team use Zenith together?
items.answer: Yes! Zenith offers robust team collaboration features including shared projects, team analytics, boundary-respecting communication tools, and collaborative goal setting. Team members can work together while maintaining individual work-life balance.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply sign up for a free 14-day trialâ€”no credit card required. The onboarding process takes just 5 minutes, and our AI will start learning your patterns immediately. You can import data from existing tools to get started faster.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or fees. Your data remains accessible during your billing period, and you can export everything before your account closes.
